Lee Jung Hyun

Korean: 이정현

Age:
45 years old
Height:
5'2" (158 cm)

Introduction

Lee Jung Hyun, also known by her occasional stage name AVA, is a South Korean singer and actress. She first started as an actress in 1996 before making her musical debut in 1999 with her first album "Let's Go To My Star".
